result.title: The SCALE-UP evaluation framework 1
result.description: This deliverable will describe the SCALEUP evaluation framework to evaluate in an efficient way the evolution of the urban nodes into climateresilient wellconnected multimodal and multiusage nodes for smart and clean mobility This is the first version of the deliverable and refers to T71

result.description: This deliverable describes the SCALEUP evaluation plan that will define the evaluation tasks and delivery both on a project level as for each of the SCALEUP urban nodes After 1 year the plan will be updated taking into account the first observations in the data collection work and possible updates in the SCALEUP measures and strategies for integration It refers to T72

result.title: Components Release V2
result.description: The complete set of innovative processing and communication components developed within the FitOptiVis project are reported and delivered. All the study, development and assessment activities for each of the task are involved. HW and SW physical components implementations, along with their related documentations, are also provided. A subset of the developed IPs (according to the CA and FitOptiVis exploitation plan) will be released open source. Task Involved: All
